replies.body: Why do I have the feeling that Lethality is going to inevitably get nerfed again because ADCs abused it?

> [{quoted}](name=FurorDivinus27,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TkAdU8ji,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-24T00:03:55.878+0000)
>
> Why do I have the feeling that Lethality is going to inevitably get nerfed again because ADCs abused it?

Its not just ADCs, plenty of champions are abusing it from {{champion:421}} and even {{champion:84}}. If they are easy auto champions, natural engagers with tankiness or just champions who have enhanced autos naturally. Anything can exploit the hell out of this item, on top of that its second passive on {{item:3147}} doubles as a EZ control ward. So thats about 5 burds its killing now. Strong attack damage, a good chunk of lethality that scale off your level so 'snowballs' galore, cool down, extra auto burst and a ward killing ability, even if its not 'easy' to control. But when you have 3+ champions using the item, they are gonna shut down vision a good chunk just by roaming around.

Those same champions i mention have 'measures' to exit vision for 1 second, possibly multiple times (Especially {{champion:84}} with her W) and gap close to get another empowered auto off alongside the one they likely got off at the beginning of a engage, with a whooping 5 seconds to give 'breathing room' on it. If they don't put a 30 second proc cooldown on it, then it basically became a abuse stick for any champion who can duck out of vision once or more times( AKA {{champion:35}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:141}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:238}} and {{champion:133}} because of her R mobility and Q vision blind, hell even {{champion:104}}  could exploit it with his smokescreen for 2 procs ) plus this is not counting champions who can plain just use the burst and don't need to proc the effect multiple times, this is just a example of champions who can use it because they can all go 'invisible for a second, sometimes more then once and exploit stacking the dmg bonus multiple times.

The item is literally broken.
Thats fine though because they ultimately  have to get close, but mf doing it from 2000 units away and getting away with her ms is annoying as hell

All you have to do is disrupt her ult, dont fight in closed areas. Even when she was going critical mf, dont fight in closed areas. Some ADC just excel in close areas. Also you must be the ones engaging her, not her team engaging you.

Most people that have the duskblade have some kind of gap close, and its called vision. 

Flank the enemy adc, gap close, and touch them. Watch them literally implode like they didn't exist.

I'm not even talking about MF's ult I've seen her literally just appear q and auto and blow ppl up she doesnt have to use gap closers or all her abilites and she does this from range so her getting cc and stunned is lower then that of a melee assassin. When will ppl get that adc's blowing ppl up isnt something that should be in the game they are a DPS class, at least with mf's ult is takes time and you can flash away, but a q auto duskblade oneshot from range isnt something that is healthy. When assassins assassinate ppl they use their entire combo to, Adc's just auto someone get they duskblade proc and auto again and someone is dead. 

Assassins with duskblade is similar to a mages  because they use their entire combo, they burst ppl down because their dmg comes from their spells assassin dont have dps they just have burst. Adc have both burst and dps which is not healthy, thats the reason they changed rengar because he had both with his q.

DPS has always killed squishy champions fast. Lethality only makes MF look good, did anyone bitch about her before lethality was here? No. They didn't. The items make her look good, even though she is a very easy champion to kill. 

Before this duskblade came out, no one bitched about mf, but now that this new duskblade came out. People have been rioting once again about the abuse of adcs with lethality. 

Oh I dont know maybe its the items that make them look good. Assassins have always been a hit or miss concept. They are either to overwhelming to play against, or they are underwhelming to the point, they die to easily, cant deal damage.

Honestly that an entirely different point from this one, but hnoestly thats a problem too. But it isnt lethality its duskblade, mf is a perfectly balanced champion and was doing well without it. Ppl dont complain about the champions they complain about the fact that they abuse items that they shouldnt. 

When lethality was out the reason it was a problem on Mf was because it scaled with you level it shouldn't have, it allowed adc's to use it which obviously wasnt healthy because they had to nerf the three abusers MF, varus, and Jihn. Making it scale with your level makes more sense because assassins want to be higher level while adc's are always a lvl behind because the exp s shared with the support. That problem was solved but now duskblade is out and range champions are abusing it  makes it even worse because they dont even need to use their full combo they just run in  auto get the proc and auto and burst someone down. DPS and burst isnt healthy thats why ppl complain about crit too because a adc being able to dps and burst isnt healthy for the game at all, their isnt even a delay like assassin or mages.
